about_the_game:
The GWR Toplight Coaches Pack 02 for Train Simulator recreates one of GWR’s best-remembered coaching stock designs. Unlike the earlier clerestory design which employed raised roof lights, the Toplights featured small lights (as in windows) directly above the main coach windows.

The GWR Toplight Coaches Pack 02 for Train Simulator includes the following rail vehicles in Chocolate & Cream and Crimson & Cream liveries:

  • D56RH (Brake Third)
  • E98 (Composite)
  • K22 (Brake Van)

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
